update.description:
* Added `3d_lidar.dae` and `3d_lidar.png`
* Created 3d\_lidar model in vrx\_gazebo/models \(.sdf and .config files\)
* Replace basic cylinder lidar with 3d\_lidar mesh onto wam-v, and changed position of lidar
* TODO: Add post and put lidar on post

**Original Lidar \+ Position**

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1082884688-Original_Lidar_Look_and_Position.png)
**New Lidar without Post**

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/22979877-Lidar_no_post.png)
‌

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1382969760-Lidar_no_post_collision.png)
**Questions:**

* Is there a reason that the lidar was originally offset in the y direction by 0.3? I moved it to the center, but I’m not sure if there was a reason for that before
* Estimated 1kg mass. Estimate based on a chart showing lidar of similar shapes and sizes. [https://autonomoustuff.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/LiDAR\_Comparison.pdf](https://autonomoustuff.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/LiDAR_Comparison.pdf)

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3431455893-Lidar_Weight_1.png)
‌

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2758874465-Lidar_Weight_2.png)
update.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
**Questions about Post:**

1. How does the post fit in with the boat and lidar? Is Lidar on the top and boat at bottom? How does the ball\+triangle section mesh with the boat?
2. There was no png in the Post folder. Inside the `Post.DAE` file, it has `file://H:\Dropbox\Cole\VRX\WamV\GPS\GPS_Diffuse.png`. Is this the right png? If so, could you please share it here? I do not think I have access to that folder.
3. How would you recommend including the post on the WAM-V? Should it be another link in the same 3d lidar macro in `wamv_gazebo/urdf/sensors/wamv_3d_lidar.xacro`? Or should it be its own part in `wamv_gazebo/urdf/wamv_gazebo.urdf.xacro`? 

Thank you!

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/501873016-Post.png)
content.html:
Questions about Post:

  1. How does the post fit in with the boat and lidar? Is Lidar on the top and boat at bottom? How does the ball+triangle section mesh with the boat?
  2. There was no png in the Post folder. Inside the Post.DAE file, it has file://H:\Dropbox\Cole\VRX\WamV\GPS\GPS_Diffuse.png. Is this the right png? If so, could you please share it here? I do not think I have access to that folder.
  3. How would you recommend including the post on the WAM-V? Should it be another link in the same 3d lidar macro in wamv_gazebo/urdf/sensors/wamv_3d_lidar.xacro? Or should it be its own part in wamv_gazebo/urdf/wamv_gazebo.urdf.xacro?

Thank you!

update.description:
* Added `3d_lidar.dae` and `3d_lidar.png`
* Created 3d\_lidar model in vrx\_gazebo/models \(.sdf and .config files\)
* Replace basic cylinder lidar with 3d\_lidar mesh onto wam-v
* TODO: Add post and put lidar on post

**Original Lidar \+ Position**

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1082884688-Original_Lidar_Look_and_Position.png)
**New Lidar without Post**

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/22979877-Lidar_no_post.png)
![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1382969760-Lidar_no_post_collision.png)
**Questions:**

* Is there a reason that the lidar was originally offset in the y direction by 0.3? I moved it to the center, but I’m not sure if there was a reason for that before
* Estimated 1kg mass. Estimate based on a chart showing lidar of similar shapes and sizes. [https://autonomoustuff.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/LiDAR\_Comparison.pdf](https://autonomoustuff.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/LiDAR_Comparison.pdf)

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3431455893-Lidar_Weight_1.png)
‌

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2758874465-Lidar_Weight_2.png)
